Title: Relentlessly criticize the "Gang of Four", set off a new upsurge of industry studying Daqing and agriculture studying Dazhai
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The woman carries Volume Five of Mao's Selected Works (Mao Zedong xuanji - 毛泽东选集). It was published in 1977 on Hua Guofeng's initiative. In this way, Hua showed he was Mao's true successor, instead of the Gang of Four.
